Desc.entry: Hard courts. From July to September on alternate Saturdays there are four main teams in a newly formed Sheffield District League. Has junior and mini tennis sessions. Members and non-members.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon, Thurs & Fri (club night), Mon 4-7pm (mini tennis squads, non members can attend), 7-8pm (adult coaching, non members can attend), Tues (matches), Wed am (veterans),1.30-4.30pm (ladies) 6-8pm (intermediates 13-18 years), Fri 4-8pm (mini tennis/junior squads, non members can attend), Sat & Sun (seniors and families), Sat am (junior coaching), Sat pm (matches)
